tasks.label: Build Active C/C++ File
args: ext=${file##*.}; compiler=gcc; [[ $ext == cpp || $ext == cxx || $ext == cc ]] && compiler=g++; stdflag='-std=c11'; [[ $compiler == g++ ]] && stdflag='-std=c++17'; $compiler -g -O2 -Wall -Wextra $stdflag "${file}" -o "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}"
tasks.detail: Build active C or C++ source file into an executable in the same folder
